attributes.action: Stop Comprimise of the Christian faith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With regards to the recent ruling surrounding "Jerry Springer the Opera"

This type of show bribgs a reproach on Christ our Saviour and Lord. We as a Christian Nation should stop people openly undermining the core of our Society but blasphming Christ. No other nation or religion would allow it. My plea is that this nation would hold to what it believes and  ot allow Christ's name to be bladphed all for entertanment.5

rejection.details: YOu must request a specific action or change.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
